title: Sample, ca. 1948
medium:
Medium: cotton, synthetic
Technique: 2\2 twill with 1\3 twill
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 19 x 22 cm (7 1/2 x 8 11/16 in.)
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Dorothy (Liebes) Morin
description: Heavy twill in red, orange, blue and dark green. Warp is orange 2-ply yarn alternating with red 2-ply yarn. Wefts have bands of red chenille, blue 2-ply yarns, green chenille in 2\2 twill and two wefts of red smooth yarn in 1\3 twill.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sample, ca. 1948.
ca. 1948. Medium: cotton, synthetic
Technique: 2\2 twill with 1\3 twill. Gift of the Estate of Dorothy (Liebes) Morin. 1972-75-56.
